mapper.insert: insert into schedule(id, date1, day1, with1, travel, subject) values (#{id},#{date1},#{day1},#{with1},#{travel},#{subject})
mapper.update: update schedule set c_place1 = #{c_place1},c_time1 = #{c_time1},c_context1 = #{c_context1} where id=#{id}
update schedule set c_place2 = #{c_place2},c_time2 = #{c_time2},c_context2 = #{c_context2} where id=#{id}
update schedule set c_place3 = #{c_place3},c_time3 = #{c_time3},c_context3 = #{c_context3} where id=#{id}
update schedule set c_place4 = #{c_place4},c_time4 = #{c_time4},c_context4 = #{c_context4} where id=#{id}
update schedule set c_place5 = #{c_place5},c_time5 = #{c_time5},c_context5 = #{c_context5} where id=#{id}
update schedule set c_place6 = #{c_place6},c_time6 = #{c_time6},c_context6 = #{c_context6} where id=#{id}
